input.sentences: this past winter was one snowstorm after another .

output.sentences: The winter snowstorm was the largest one I've seen in the past 20 years!
There was a food of snow, and it took forever to get the cars cleaned off.
It takes great skill to drive in snowy conditions.
Eventually people got through and went out to do some snow sports.
